Jersey_City.Adams Express Building:
Adams Express Building is an office building owned by RXR Realty and located at 61 Broadway in lower Manhattan, New York City.
Architect Francis Kimball designed the 32-story building, and construction began in 1912 on the property numbers 57-61 Broadway, with numbers 33-41 Trinity Place. Cost was estimated in 1912 at $2,000,000.
